Text:

Strajow ...That usually means FINISHES and they need to kill some time, haha.
No main card unless I get money. Visit site for details.
I love it no matter what, though.  Those damn FB prelims are so jerky I get headaches half the time.  That was a really dumb move by the UFC.
can you upload the main card please???
what site sec? and how much?
Saff.. Dont watch the fb prelims on fb, watch them on youtube next. Everytime i watch through fb it plays up, always perfect stream through youtube!!
and I dont think the main card has completely finished yet guys

from secs wordpress site everyone
................................................................
I will cap the UFC 158 Prelims on FX, but I won’t be able to cap UFC 158 for you guys unless you help me here. It’s $60. All I need is $10 from six of you, or $5 from twelve of you! I know we can do it, guys! There’s hundreds of thousands of people downloading my files each UFC event, and the reason is because you know I bring quality, so how about it? If someone donates the full $60 I will even do everyone a favor and cap the event in full quality 1080i for die hard HD fans! If I receive any extra donations, they will strictly be going to my monthly medication as I am not well  and suffer from many health issues and cannot afford to take care of myself, so you’ll also be helping me out big time! I will also use it for future UFC events if the amount far exceeds the PPV goal of $60! So if you’re not helping now, you’re helping in the future to cap UFC PPV! Have I ever let you guys down before? Be a part of spreading quality MMA! Send your donation by going to (check site for this part) and I will give you guys the best and fastest upload on the internet, as always! If the link doesn’t work, just send your donations to the email address (check site again)
